title: Un Vizhigalil Lyrics Maan Karate Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Un Vizhigalil
Singer:  Anirudh, Shruthi Haasan
Music: Anirudh
Movie: Maan Karate
Lyrics: R D Raja
Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words
Un Vizhigalil, vilundha naatkalil
naan tholaindhadhu, adhuve podhumey
ver edhuvum vendaamey, penney.

Un uyirinil, kalandha naatkalil
naan karaindhadhu, adhuve podhumey
ver edhuvum vendaamey,penney

en kanavinil vandha kadhaliye
kan vizhippadharkkul vandhaaye
naan thaedi thaedi thaan alanjitten
en dhevadhaya kandu pidichitten

Naan mulusa ennathaan kuduthutten
ada unna vaangitten.

nee dhinam sirichaa podhumey
vera edhuvum venaamey, naan vazhave
Naan unna  rasichaa podhumey
vera edhuvum venaamey, naan vazhave

Kaattru veesum dhisai ellaam
nee pesum satham ketteney
naan kaattraai maari poveney anbe.

Un kaiviral theendi sendraale
en iravugal neelum thannaale
ini pagalai virumba maatteney, anbe.

azhagaana indha kadhal
anbaale nijamaachu.
uyirodu unnarvaaga
nam kadhal kalandhaachu.

nee dhinam sirichaa podhumey
vera edhuvum venaamey, naan vazhave
Naan unna rasichaa podhumey
vera edhuvum venaamey, naan vazhave

Un Vizhigalil, vilundha naatkalil
naan tholaindhadhu, adhuve podhumey
ver edhuvum vendaamey, penney.

Un uyirinil, kalandha naatkalil
naan karaindhadhu, adhuve podhumey
ver edhuvum vendaamey,penney		 English Translation
I tried my best :)
From the day I fell in your eyes
I lost myself. Thats enough, my girl,
I dont need anything else.

From the day  I mixed in your soul
I dissolved, thats enough, my girl
I dont need anything else.

you came in my dream
vanished before I woke up.
I wandered searching you
and found my Angal.

I gave myself fully and
bought you back.

Its enough if you laugh everyday
I dont need anything else to live.
Its enough if I see you everyday
I dont need anything else to live

From all air flowing directions
I hear your voice.
I’ll change as air, my love.

If I go holding your hands
night will extend itself.
I won’t like day time any more, my love.

This beautiful love,
now came true
Like feeling in life
our love got mixed.

Its enough if you laugh everyday
I dont need anything else to live.
Its enough if I see you everyday
I dont need anything else to live

From the day I fell in your eyes
I lost myself. Thats enough, my girl,
I dont need anything else.

From the day  I mixed in your soul
I dissolved, thats enough, my girl
I dont need anything else.
